hero.subtitle: I am a Web Developer, passionate about what I do and always wanting to learn something new.

about-me.title: I'm Octavio, nice to meet you
about-me.description: I'm 22 years old. I am a student of Multimedial Language at the University of Arts La Plata. I love taking designs and making them a reality on the web, I can spend hours perfecting the details.
